ProductInfo.Features:
This Kit includes 13 items all with USA Warranty and manufacturer's supplied accessories
Olympus OM-D E-M5 16MP Micro Four Thirds Mirrorless Live MOS Interchangeable Lens Camera with 3.0-Inch Tilting OLED Touchscreen Body (Silver) - Olympus M.Zuiko 12-50mm f/3.5-6.3 MCS ED Zoom Lens (Black) - 52mm UV Protection Filter
32 Gigabyte SDHC Secure Digital Memory Card - Secure Digital USB Card Reader - Universal Memory Card Wallet - Pack of LCD Screen Protectors
Additional BLN-1 Rechargeable Lithium-ion Replacement Battery Pack - Padded Digital Camera Carrying Case with Pockets & Strap
Full Size 50" Tripod W/Case - Focus Digital Grey Card Set - HDMI cable for HDTV connection - BONUS!! Free 25 Quality Prints
ProductInfo.Name: Olympus OM-D E-M5 16MP Micro Four Thirds Mirrorless Digital Camera (Silver) with M.Zuiko 12-50mm f/3.5-6.3 MCS ED Zoom Lens + BLN-1 Battery + 10pc Bundle 32GB Deluxe Accessory Kit
